row.process:
! selon &EF# trouver le code ENTITE SITE :SET &CLE#=&EF#_&ENTITE_KISS# :SET &ENTITE_SITE#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.KISS, &CLE#,3) :SET &OUTIL_BACKUP#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.BACKUP, &ENTITE_SITE#) ! :IF &OUTIL_BACKUP# = " " : PRINT KO: OUTIL_BACKUP VIDE : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,OUTIL_BACKUP:VIDE" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="OUTIL_BACKUP:VIDE" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK:OUTIL_BACKUP &OUTIL_DNS# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,OUTIL_BACKUP:&OUTIL_BACKUP#" :ENDIF
!:PUBLISH &EXIT_KISS_OK#,,"TOP" !:PUBLISH &EXIT_KISS_KO#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &OUTIL_BACKUP#,,"TOP"
